price: Lakini walio kufuru wamo katika majivuno na upinzani .
arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي عِزَّةٖ وَشِقَاقٖ
footnotes: Lakini walio kufuru wamo katika majivuno, hawataki kufuata Haki, na wanawafanyia inda watu wa Haki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: bali alladhīna kafarū fī ʿizzatin washiqāqin
